value.title: The Top Artificial-Intelligence ETFs Have a Common Ingredient
value.excerpt: AI-themed exchange-traded funds have grown in popularity this year. While they differ somewhat under the hood, nearly all of them have Nvidia as the biggest holding. The largest fund in the AI specific segment—the Global X Robotics & Artificial Intelligence ETF—gives Nvidia an 11% weight.
